entity.name: story_sentences
entity.query: select ss.story_sentences_id || '_ss' as id, 'ss' as field_type, now() as solr_import_date, ps.processed_stories_id, ss.* from story_sentences ss INNER JOIN processed_stories ps ON ( ss.stories_id = ps.stories_id ) where '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR db_row_last_updated > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: media_tags_map
entity.query: select tags_id as tags_id_media, * from media_tags_map

entity.name: stories_tags_map
entity.query: select tags_id as tags_id_stories, * from stories_tags_map
